string-array.name: storyStringsArray
string-array.item: You are traveling down a long road, carrying a rare medicine for your sister in your pocket. The vial gleams in your bag. A large monster jumps out and steals it. You chase after it and find what seems to be its den. You see a smaller monster guarding the entrance. There\'s only one way past it.
You enter the structure. A monster looks at you in shock.
As you go deeper into the den, you encounter a fork in the road. A monster guards each path. You choose to fight the weaker looking one.
The path is strangely narrow. There\'s nowhere to hide when something appears.

You come to a room at the end of the road you chose. A slightly bigger monster sits in the corner. You can see it isn\'t the same one you encountered earlier, so you try to leave without disturbing it. The ground crunches below your feet. The monster turns around and attacks.
Having hit a dead end, you turn around and try the other path. The guard is still there, but you now feel powerful enough to take it on.
This path leads to a much larger area than the first. Three monsters are in this room. They are far enough apart that you can take them on one at a time. You approach the one closest to you.
The other two still haven\'t noticed you. You again attack the closest one.
The third finally sees you. It attacks, angry that you have killed its friends.

With the room now cleared, you see a small opening, barely big enough for you to crawl through. With no where else to go, you enter it. It seems to go on forever. The den is much larger than you could have guessed. After what feels like an eternity, the crawl space opens to a room full of shiny objects. Sitting in the center is the monster who stole your vial.
You feel stronger than before. You finally have your vial back. The medicine is still intact. Your sister will be saved.

string-array.name: tutorialStringsArray
string-array.item: How the game works: All entities have two skills: Magic and Physical. Each skill has an attack and defense stat. The attack stat determines the power of an attack made with that skill, while the defense stat reduces damage taken from attacks made with that skill.

In a fight, combat occurs in turns. Sometimes you will move first, but other times your opponent will. All moves are resolved before the next turn starts. To select your move, click on the button labeled with the attack type you want (“Magic Attack” or “Physical Attack”).

After completing each fight, you will be presented with three upgrade options. One is always related to your Magic skill, one is always related to your Physical skill, and one is always related to your health.
